key_message: Request for cosponsorship of bill addressing broadband access gap in rural Texas communities
talking_points: Your district includes 12 rural counties with broadband access below 60%
This bill provides $2B in grants specifically for rural deployment
Texas Agriculture Commissioner has expressed support for rural broadband investment
Bill includes provisions to prevent overbuilding in areas with existing service
constituent_connection: Three school districts in your district have reported students unable to complete homework due to lack of home internet
political_considerations: Bipartisan bill with 8 Republican cosponsors, aligns with rural development priorities
next_steps: Request 15-minute call with member or LD to discuss bill details and answer questions
disclaimer: Legislator communications require review for accuracy and appropriateness before delivery.
